$WmMPID_ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Are you sure about this, Maria?
Practice though it may be, I'm not
comfortable putting you in danger...$k$p$WmMPID_マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Don't worry! I want to get stronger.
How else can I help you? I need to
train! Please!$k$p$Sbs1000|
